message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  I think it could really benefit you.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $9,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at $8,200?
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $8,200 is quite a bit lower than I had in mind.  Could you do $9,000?  I'm confident you'll find it's worth the investment.
I'm still not sure I can get to $9,000, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. Can you do $8,500? I really think this product could be a good fit for me.
